finalFeedback.textNeeded: Well done, you have completed this interaction.

question.p: Anak yang biasanya (usually) saya jaga (supervise) berumur tiga sampai duabelas tahun.

feedback.p: The children whom I usually baby sit are aged between three and twelve years.

question.p: Pekerjaan yang ingin saya dapatkan adalah pekerjaan di bidang seni (art) karena saya orang yang kreatif.

feedback.p: The work that I wish to obtain is work in the field/area of art because I am a creative person.

question.p: Pekerjaan yang pernah (ever) saya dapatkan termasuk pekerjaan di warung, di kantor bapak saya, dan di wartel.

feedback.p: Work/jobs which I have obtained include work in a warung, my dad’s office, and in a wartel.

question.p: Orang yang kami cari harus bersifat disiplin.

feedback.p: The person whom we seek must have a disciplined nature.

question.p: Tugas yang harus Anda kerjakan termasuk mencuci piring dan membersihkan WC.

feedback.p: The jobs that you must do include washing the dishes and cleaning the toilets.

question.p: Lamaran yang Anda serahkan tidak lengkap.

feedback.p: The application which you submitted was incomplete.
